meanings.definition: Workers who collect and dispose of garbage.
meanings.sent1: The garbagemen come early in the morning to pick up our trash.
meanings.sent2: The garbagemen drive around the neighborhood in their garbage truck.
meanings.sent3: The garbagemen found a lost puppy in the trash and rescued it.
meanings.sent4: The garbagemen are like silent heroes, cleaning up our mess without complaint.
meanings.sent5: The garbagemen wear bright orange vests for safety as they work.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals employed to pick up and remove trash from residential and commercial areas.
meanings.sent1: Our neighborhood has a reliable team of garbagemen who keep the streets clean.
meanings.sent2: The garbagemen work together efficiently to empty all the bins on the block.
meanings.sent3: The garbagemen jokingly call themselves the 'trash troopers' as they go about their work.
meanings.sent4: The garbagemen move like a well-oiled machine, swiftly clearing away the waste.
meanings.sent5: The garbagemen take pride in their job, knowing they play a vital role in the community.
